title: Cap Streamers, 1700–50
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Brussels style
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Brussels-style cap streamers. Half-cartouches on each piece (as if from a continutous textile) containing sprays of flowers.
